posts.post_content:
I consigned this card to REA and wanted to let y'all know that it is there:

[url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=174673[/url]

I think I recall Jay saying he knew of 2 and that one was trimmed. 

Thanks!
I think I've seen three but that only matters if someone is collecting poses and I know of no one who is currently collecting Cleveland poses.

how one collector can significantly change the value of a particular OJ subset if they leave the OJ market.  I do know someone who probably has the 2nd most number of Cleveland OJ poses in the hobby.

Angyale
I have all poses of this player.
